view

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • view.GameBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class GameBoard
extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
    This class represents the area where the game is taking place. This class has code based upon the following project: Zoltan Dalmadi, "JCardGamesFX", 2015, GitHub repository, github.com/ZoltanDalmadi/JCardGamesFX.
